DOC.brief_summary: The current study examine effect maturity sprint jump performance single year age group 13 year old boy .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator examine issue adolescent boy ( n = 107 ) age 13.0 13.9 year . The maturity status assess use self-assessment stage pubic hair base criterion Tanner . Body composition maximal voluntary knee extension torque ( KET ) determine use bioelectrical impedance analyzer static myometer , respectively . Sprint velocity measure non-motorized treadmill . Jump height calculate following equation ; g × ( flight time ) 2 × 8 × 10-1 . The flight time jumping measure matswitch system .
